price: Nyankopͻn abͻ no dua. Asεm a ͻbonsam kaeε ne sε: “(Awurade), mεfa Wo nkoa no mu kyεfa bi a yatwa ato hͻ no-,
arabic: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: laʿanahu al-lahu waqāla la-attakhidhanna min ʿibādika naṣīban mafrūḍan
